Date creation getter.

Date edition getter.

Makes db arguments from object :return: List with board info

Name getter.

Completion getter.

Controllers¶

BoardController¶

class Controllers.BoardController.BoardController(api)¶

Board Controller class.

Defines api for boards.

class AddBoard¶
put()¶

Adds new board

Handles ‘put’ requests on route /board/add with parameter ‘name’ in data

Example:

  • put(‘http://localhost:5000/board/add’, data={‘name’: ‘Brand new board’})

Returns

Id of created board.

class DeleteBoard¶
put(id)¶

Deletes board(by id)

Handles ‘put’ requests on route board/delete/ with parameter ‘name’ in data

Example:

  • put(‘http://localhost:5000/board/delete/1’)

Parameters

id – Board id.

Returns

Success(even if board doesn’t exist)

class EditBoardName¶
put(id)¶

Change specific board’s name(by id)

Handles ‘put’ requests on route /board/edit/<id> with parameter ‘name’ in data

Example:

  • put(‘http://localhost:5000/board/edit/1’, data={‘name’: ‘New name’})

Parameters

id – Board id.

Returns

Success(even if board doesn’t exist).

class GetBoard¶
get(id)¶

Get specific board(by id)

Handles ‘get’ requests on board /board/get/<id>

Example:

  • get(‘http://localhost:5000/board/get/5’)

Parameters

id – Board id.

Returns

Json response with board (id: board) or error response if id is wrong

class GetBoards¶
get()¶

Get all boards

Handles ‘get’ requests on route board/get_all

Example:

  • get(‘http://localhost:5000/board/get_all’)

Returns

Json response with all boards(id: board)

TaskController¶

class Controllers.TaskController.TaskController(api)¶

Task Controller class.

Defines api for tasks.

class AddTask¶
put(board_id)¶

Adds new task to specific board(by board id)

Handles ‘put’ requests on route /task/add/<board_id> with parameters:

  • ‘name’

  • ‘description’

  • ‘completed’

in request data

Example:
  • put(‘http://localhost:5000/task/add/5’, data={‘name’: ‘Task 1’,

    ‘description’: “Create TaskTracker api”,’completed’: False})

Parameters

board_id – Id of board for task to be added.

Returns

Id of created task.

class DeleteTask¶
put(id)¶

Deletes task(by task id)

Handles ‘put’ requests on route /task/delete/<id>

Example:

  • put(‘http://localhost:5000/task/delete/2’)

Parameters

id – Id of task to be deleted.

Returns

Success(even if task doesn’t exist)

class EditTask¶
put(id)¶

Edits task(by task id)

Handles ‘put’ requests on route /task/edit/<id> with OPTIONAL parameters:

  • ‘name’

  • ‘description’

  • ‘completed’

in request data

Example:
  • put(‘http://localhost:5000/task/edit/2’,

    data={‘name’: ‘Edited name’, ‘completed’: True})

Parameters

board_id – Id of board for task to be edited.

Returns

Success or error if id is wrong

class GetTask¶
get(id)¶

Gets task(by task id)

Handles ‘get’ requests on route /task/get/<id>

Example:

  • get(‘http://localhost:5000/task/get/2’)

Parameters

id – Id of task to be got.

Returns

Json response with task(id: task) or error response if id is wrong.

class GetTasks¶
get(board_id)¶

Gets all tasks from specific board(by board id)

Handles ‘get’ requests on route /task/get_all/<board_id>

Example:

  • get(‘http://localhost:5000/task/get_all/1’)

Parameters

board_id – Id of board for tasks to be got.

Returns

Json response with tasks(id: task).

DAO¶

BaseDAO¶

class DAO.BaseDAO.BaseDAO¶

Basic Data Object class.

Does database connection and disconnection.

close()¶

Closes connection to database

open()¶

Connecnts to database

Returns

Database cursor

BoardDAO¶

class DAO.BoardDAO.BoardDAO¶

Board Data Access Object class.

Creates interface for db actions with boards

static AddBoard(board)¶

Adds board to DB

Parameters

board – Board object

Returns

Id of created board.

static DeleteBoard(id=1)¶

Deletes specific board from DB

Parameters

id – Id of board to be deleted.

static EditBoardName(id=1, name='Name')¶

Change name of specific board(by id) in DB

Parameters

  • id – Id of board to be changed.

  • name – New name of board

static GetBoard(id=1)¶

Gets specific board from DB

Parameters

id – Id of board to be got.

Returns

Sql resonse with board

static GetBoards()¶

Gets all boards from DB

Returns

List with sql response with boards ordered by id ascending

TaskDAO¶

class DAO.TaskDAO.TaskDAO¶

Task Data Access Object class.

Creates interface for db actions with tasks

static AddTask(task, board_id=1)¶

Adds task to DB

Parameters

board_id – Board id to which the task belongs

Returns

Id of created task.

static DeleteTask(id=1)¶

Deletes task from DB by id

Parameters

id – Task id

static EditTask(task, id=1)¶

Change specific task from DB by id

Parameters

  • task – Task object

  • id – Task id

static GetTask(id=1)¶

Get specific task from DB by id

Parameters

id – Task id

Returns

Sql response with task

static GetTasks(board_id=1)¶

Get tasks from DB by board id

Parameters

board_id – Board id to which the tasks belongs

Returns

List with sql responses with tasks.
